rvx_stuck_with_something_get_help_from_l: Stuck with something? Get help from live chat or support ticket.
rvx_get_notification_when_customer_send_: Get notification, when customer send reviews
rvx_if_any_user_submit_review_in_your_pr: If any user submit review in your product, it will appear here. Or you can import your existing reviews
rvx_who_can_send_reviews_on_your_shop: Who can send reviews on your shop?
rvx_show_verified_owner_label_on_custome: Show "Verified owner" label on customer reviews
rvx_in_which_order_status_your_customer_: In which order status your customer will be able to send reviews?
rvx_review_will_be_auto_publish_on_your_: Review will be auto publish on your site after submission
rvx_show_or_hide_the_reviewer_s_name_alo: Show or hide the reviewer's name alongside their review. This helps build trust and authenticity for your product reviews.
rvx_display_the_reviewer_s_country_with_: Display the reviewer's country with their review. It adds more context and credibility to the feedback.
rvx_allow_customers_to_like_or_dislike_i: Allow customers to like or dislike individual reviews. This helps highlight helpful feedback and engage your audience.
rvx_customer_can_like_or_dislike_any_rev: Customer can like or dislike any review
rvx_enable_sharing_options_for_reviews_a: Enable sharing options for reviews, allowing customers to share them on social media or other platforms, increasing your product's visibility.
rvx_allow_customer_to_share_review_to_th: Allow customer to share review to the social media
rvx_add_a_title_field_to_reviews_allowin: Add a title field to reviews, allowing customers to summarize their feedback in a few words for quick insights.
rvx_customer_can_add_a_title_during_add_: Customer can add a title during add a review
rvx_enable_customers_to_attach_photos_to: Enable customers to attach photos to their reviews, adding visual proof and enhancing the credibility of their feedback.
rvx_allow_customers_to_upload_the_image_: Allow customers to upload the image with review
rvx_enable_customers_to_submit_video_rev: Enable customers to submit video reviews, providing a more detailed and engaging way to showcase their experiences.
rvx_allow_customers_to_upload_video_with: Allow customers to upload video with review
rvx_allow_reviewers_to_add_a_recommendat: Allow reviewers to add a recommendation (yes or no) for the product, giving future customers a clear sense of overall satisfaction.
rvx_allow_customers_to_recommend_the_pro: Allow customers to recommend the products
rvx_enable_anonymous_reviews_allowing_cu: Enable anonymous reviews, allowing customers to provide feedback without revealing their identity, which may encourage more honest opinions.
rvx_allow_customer_to_give_review_anonym: Allow customer to give review anonymously
rvx_customer_can_allow_you_to_use_his_re: Customer can allow you to use his review for promotional use
rvx_one_customer_can_send_multiple_revie: One customer can send multiple reviews on the same product
One customer can send multiple reviews
rvx_allow_reviews_based_on_multiple_crit: Allow reviews based on multiple criteria, such as quality, price, and ease of use. This gives customers a more comprehensive understanding of the product
rvx_your_customers_can_sent_there_review: Your customers can sent there review on your product based on multiple criteria
rvx_available_on_the_pro_plan_and_above: Available on the Pro plan and above
rvx_secondary_text_will_place_here_below: Secondary text will place here, below the image
rvx_disable_product_schema_markup_for_re: Disable product schema markup for reviews.
rvx_enable_google_recaptcha_to_prevent_s: Enable Google reCAPTCHA to prevent spam and ensure that reviews are submitted by real users, enhancing the integrity of your customer reviews.
rvx_see_where_will_get_the_key: See where will get the key
rvx_very_good_badge_will_show_on_more_th: "Very good" badge will show on more than 4 star+ review
rvx_how_the_reviews_should_look_on_your_: How the reviews should look on your site?
rvx_it_will_impact_on_your_public_view_s: It will impact on your public view site
rvx_customer_can_view_review_lists_by_ap: Customer can view review lists by applying filtered and short
rvx_you_may_combine_any_of_the_options_a: You may combine any of the options above.
rvx_this_is_the_first_mail_you_send_to_a: This is the first mail you send to ask a customer for a review. You can set it to send after a certain number of days from purchase, depending on the order status.
rvx_upload_a_jpg_png_or_gif_image_that_s: Upload a JPG, PNG, or GIF image that's up to 1200px wide and less than 5MB in size.
rvx_here_is_a_list_of_supported_pre_set_: Here is a list of supported pre-set email placeholders:
rvx_send_a_second_request_to_customers_w: Send a second request to customers who haven’t left a review yet. This helps remind them to share their feedback.
rvx_encourage_customers_to_enhance_their: Encourage customers to enhance their review by adding a photo or video. This follow-up request goes to those who haven’t included media with their review.
rvx_this_is_the_first_mail_you_send_to_a: This is the first mail you send to ask a customer for a review. You can set it to send after a certain number of days from purchase, depending on the order status. Change email content
rvx_send_a_second_request_to_customers_w: Send a second request to customers who haven’t left a review yet. This helps remind them to share their feedback. Change email content.
rvx_send_another_email_to_ask_customers_: Send another email to ask customers to add a photo or video to their review if they haven't already.
rvx_make_sure_your_customers_can_unsubsc: Make sure your customers can unsubscribe from emails when you send them.
rvx_give_customers_a_discount_after_they: Give customers a discount after they leave their first review from your review request email. This reward thanks them for their feedback.
rvx_check_this_box_if_the_coupon_grants_: Check this box if the coupon grants free shipping.
rvx_check_this_box_if_the_coupon_cannot_: Check this box if the coupon cannot be used with other coupons.
rvx_send_a_discount_to_customers_who_sub: Send a discount to customers who submit a review after receiving a follow-up reminder. It’s a great way to encourage reviews from those who haven’t responded yet.
rvx_reward_customers_with_a_discount_whe: Reward customers with a discount when they add a photo or video to their review after receiving this request. This encourages them to share more detailed feedback.
rvx_offer_a_discount_for_customers_who_s: Offer a discount for customers who submit reviews directly from your store
rvx_the_review_request_email_will_includ: The review request email will include this discount message. Make sure the discount is enabled.
rvx_customers_will_receive_an_email_with: Customers will receive an email with the discount codes upon submitting their reviews. In this section below, you can edit the content of the discount email.
rvx_buy_more_with_discount_amount_off_fo: Buy more with [discount_amount] off for your review on [shop_name]!
rvx_we_are_really_grateful_for_your_valu: We are really grateful for your valuable feedback!
rvx_here_is_a_little_appreciation_for_yo: Here is a little appreciation for your time.
rvx_please_redeem_the_discount_code_to_g: Please redeem the discount code to get a
rvx_discount_message_for_review_reminder: Discount Message for Review Reminder Email
rvx_this_additional_message_will_include: This additional message will included in the review reminder emails to motivate the customer for leaving reviews.
rvx_are_you_sure_that_you_want_to_discon: Are you sure that you want to disconnect this location?
rvx_all_reviews_will_be_removed_under_th: All reviews will be removed under this location
rvx_how_to_import_reviews_from_csv_file: How to import reviews from CSV file
rvx_organize_your_reviews_in_relative_se: Organize your reviews in relative sections
rvx_note_if_you_already_have_a_csv_file_: Note: if you already have a csv file prepared, please ensure it is organized in the same format as our sample file before uploading.
rvx_select_a_date_range_for_export_revie: Select a date range for export reviews
rvx_you_can_also_export_specific_product: You can also export specific product reviews, if you want
